io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.salesmanagement.common.api

Interface Bill

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ApplicationEntity, net.sf.mmm.util.lang.api.attribute.AttributeReadId<Long>, net.sf.mmm.util.entity.api.Entity, net.sf.mmm.util.entity.api.GenericEntity<Long>, net.sf.mmm.util.entity.api.MutableGenericEntity<Long>, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BillEntity, BillEto

    public interface Bill
extends ApplicationEntity
    This is the interface for a Bill. It represents the actual payment for an Order.

    • Method Detail

      • getTotal

        Money getTotal()
        Returns:
        the total amount that has to be payed for this Bill.

      • setTotal

        Parameters:

      • getTip

        @NotNegativeMoney(message="The tip must not be negative!")
Money getTip()
        Returns:
        the tip (voluntary payment in addition to total amount).
